bibl.title: A Case of Sibling Scribes in Coptic Thebes.
bibl.note: Focuses on the scribes Aristophanes and Johannakios, arguing that these are brothers who were trained in the same way. - Palaeography. - Language. - Social context. - Sibling scribes?

bibl.title: Bulletin of the Australian Centre for Egyptology

bibl.seg: Jennifer Cromwell, A Case of Sibling Scribes in Coptic Thebes.
Focuses on the scribes Aristophanes and Johannakios, arguing that these are brothers who were trained in the same way. - Palaeography. - Language. - Social context. - Sibling scribes?
